CustomField.description: Referred in BIZ-702 'OP4I Pricebook Tier' formula field
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Tier__c , "Tier A"), "A","") & IF(INCLUDES(Tier__c , "Tier B"), "B","") & IF(INCLUDES(Tier__c , "Tier C"), "C","") & IF(INCLUDES(Tier__c , "Tier D"), "D","") & IF(INCLUDES(Tier__c , "Tier E"), "E","") & IF(INCLUDES(Tier__c , "Tier (none)"), "(none)","")
CustomField.label: Tier Formula
